comments:
Using CVS Repositories view to navigate through CVS structure.
I wanted to checkout a folder as new project, therefore right-clicked, 
selected "Checkout as...". But I selected a wrong folder. The one I needed was 
a subfolder of the one I accidantly chose.
After hitting "Cancel" I right-clicked again - this time on the subfolder I 
wanted - and got an "Iternal Error".
After manually refreshing the view the error doesn't occur again. In addition 
to that it doesn't occur when the folder used during the second attempt is no 
subfolder of the first one.

I was able to reproduce this when both items involved did not contain .project 
files. Here is the traceback
